column4: i am inside a folder wich has a makefile in it but when i type "make" in terminal i get ""make: *** No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop."" why?
usually the compiling process starts out with a ./configure command.
what do u mean? i did ./configure first, and make after, but doesnt work
when installing software that is not from the repositories, you should ask the maintainers of that software for support
